ValidationRule.description: "Branded Ads activated" checkbox has to be ticked before closing the case. RO-1759
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed"), RecordType.DeveloperName = "Branded_ads_Case", ISPICKVAL( Request_Type__c , "Activate Branded Ads") , NOT( Branded_Ads_activated__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Branded Ads Activated checkbox is not ticked. The field needs to be checked before the case can be closed
